title: 训练计划 III (训练计划 III)
content: 思路: // @Title: 训练计划 III (训练计划 III) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2022-02-20 20:16:10 // @Runtime: 0 ms // @Memory: 40.4 MB // @comment: // @flag: /** * Definition for singly-linked list. * public class ListNode { * int val; * ListNode next; * ListNode(int x) { val = x; } * } */ class Solution { public ListNode reverseList(ListNode head) { ListNode pre=null; ListNode cur=head; while(cur!=null){ ListNode temp =cur.next; cur.next=pre; pre=cur; cur=temp; } return pre; } }
